GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by date in descending order

GET /api/articles/1.description: serves an article with the corresponding id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/6/comments.description: serves the comments for a given article_id

exampleResponse.body: This is a bad article name
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/6/comments.description: adds a comment for a given article and responds with the comment

exampleResponse.body: I didn't find this article very interesting
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/1.description: updates a given article by incrementing or decrementing the votes

DELETE /api/comments/8.description: deletes a comment by comment id
